channel.title: [562] Help with system update command [562]
channel.description:
I've tried many times over to input a "Update Command" That will: 1) Log you out until manually server restart 2) Your able to input your own time
Can anyone help me?
Thanks in advanced.

item.title: [562] Help with system update command [562]
item.dc:creator: @steven10034 steven10034
item.description:
@steven10034 wrote:

Thanks, for your help. I’m still having problems to make it so I input the time via in-game and that it will logout all users and they won’t be able to enter until I restart the server.

I remembered a server that had the same thing I wanted, but I forgot the name of it.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Help with system update command [562]
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

i got a command…

if (cmd[0].equals("update")) { for (Player pl : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if (pl != null) { pl.getActionSender().sendSystemUpdate(100); } } }

just try to modify it for what u want…

hope i helped

Read full topic
